name: Disparity
description: Disparity is an extreme precision 2D Puzzle Platformer based around one core mechanic: swapping the polarity of levels.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 1.5 Ghz Memory: 3 GB RAM Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 400 MB available space
